mapper.select: select bno,title,content,writer,view_cnt,comment_cnt,reg_date from board order by reg_date desc, bno desc
mapper.delete: delete from board where bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
insert into board(bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date) values(#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{view_cnt}, #{comment_cnt}, #{reg_date}, #{up_date})
